issue.title: ABI checker has false positives in source compatibility

content.raw:
I just demangled the added and removed symbols and this shows the difference:

### Base64Decode ( std::__cxx11::string const& _encodedString )

Symbols added and removed

* _Z12Base64DecodeRKNSt7__cxx1112basic_stringIcEE
* _Z12Base64DecodeRKNSt7__cxx1112basic_stringIcSt11char_traitsIcESaIcEEE

Demangled symbols added and removed

* Base64Decode(std::__cxx11::basic_string<char> const&)
* Base64Decode(std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > const&)

the string types are not matching up because they have char_traits and allocator added

I don't know why there's a difference
content.html:
I just demangled the added and removed symbols and this shows the difference:

Base64Decode ( std::__cxx11::string const& _encodedString )

Symbols added and removed

  • _Z12Base64DecodeRKNSt7__cxx1112basic_stringIcEE
  • _Z12Base64DecodeRKNSt7__cxx1112basic_stringIcSt11char_traitsIcESaIcEEE

Demangled symbols added and removed

  • Base64Decode(std::__cxx11::basic_string<char> const&)
  • Base64Decode(std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > const&)

the string types are not matching up because they have char_traits and allocator added

I don't know why there's a difference
